pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Fiducial Inference for Extremes // Fiducial framework to perform inference on the quantiles for a generalized Pareto distribution model and on the parameters of the Pareto exceedance distribution, assuming the exceedance threshold is a known or unknown parameter. Reference: Damian V. Wandler Jan Hannig (2012) doi:10.1007/s10687-011-0127-9.
